dmca.title: Universal Requests Takedown of Links to Websites Offering Copies of TV Shows
dmca.body:
OCT-20-2004 17:22	MOTION PIC. TECH. OFF.	[private]	P.O1

UNIVERSAL FAX

Universal Pictures Technology - [private]

*** Copyright Violation Notification
Google Inc.
Attn: Customer Support, DMCA Complaints 
[private]
Mountain View, CA 94043
Fax: [private]

Re: Unauthorized Use of Universal Properties Notice ID: SportsManiac0002 October 14, 2004

Dear Sir or Madam:

Please be advised that Universal City Studios Productions LLLP and its affiliated companies (collectively Universal) are the exclusive owners of copyrights and other intellectual property rights in many motion pictures and television programs, including the title(s) listed below (the Universal Properties). Universal diligently enforces its rights in its motion pictures and television programs.

It has come to our attention that unauthorized copies of the Universal Properties are being offered from the website listed below. Axess Communications is the service provider for this website, and we believe that Axess Communications or a downstream service provider who purchases this connectivity from Axess Communications is providing the Internet access of the person responsible for such activity (the Infringer).

Additionally, we have also become aware that links to the Infringing Web Pages listed below appear as a "Sponsored Links" of Google when the search terms listed below are entered in Google's search engine.

We hereby request your assistance in stopping the unauthorized distribution, copying and/or sale of the Universal Properties by the infringer by removing or disabling Google users' access to the Infringers online location (through online advertisements, links or otherwise) in accordance with 17 U.S.C.
